comments: The inverse binomial transform is 0,14,16 followed by all-0 (followed by A000004). - _R. J. Mathar_, May 06 2008Sequence found by reading the line from 0, in the direction 0, 14,..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the triangular numbers A000217. Opposite numbers to the even hexagonal numbers A014635 in the same spiral. - Omar E. Pol, Sep 03 2011
formula: O.g.f.: 2x(7+x)/(1-x)^3. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 06 2008a(n)=16*n+a(n-1)-2 (with a(0)=0) [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
